    Docstrings
    BKTrees.BKTree — Type.

    The B-K tree structure.

    BKTrees.BKTrees
    BKTrees.Node — Type.

    A node in the B-K tree.

    BKTrees.add! — Function.

    Adds a node (i.e. Node{T}(item::T)) to the tree.

    BKTrees.eval
    BKTrees.find — Function.

    Find items in the tree whose distance is less or equal to n and returns the top k items, ordered ascending according to the distance.

    BKTrees.hamming_distance — Function.

    Calculates the Hamming distance (numbers of different bits) between two numbers.

    BKTrees.include
    BKTrees.is_empty_node — Function.

    Determines whether a Node in the BKTree is empty or not.
